message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $85. Could you meet me halfway at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still can't go above $87. Is there any chance we could meet in the middle?
